group_1.textRight: She...is really late.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
A full two hours have passed since the time@we promised to meet.

group_1.textRight: This girl you're waiting for, Tsukasa was it?
You two must be really close if you're@willing to wait this long for her.

group_1.textLeft: Very much so!

group_1.textRight: I also...should've waited.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?
Whoever for?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm sorry. I just remembered, back@when I was little...
There...was someone I was really close to.
The two of us...we lived right around here...
We made a promise. That we'd go to@Minagi Sea.
We'd go to the Christmas party and watch@the snow fall together.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: She told me...
She said there was nothing more beautiful...
Than a white Christmas at Minagi Sea.@"Just so you know!" she said.
It got to be 30 minutes after the time we@promised to meet, but she didn't show...
I got angry and went home.

group_1.textLeft: Were...you able to make amends with this@close friend of yours?

group_1.textRight: No...
She was in and out of the hospital a lot.

group_1.textLeft: You don't mean...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
Exactly that.
The thought that, that would be our last@Christmas together...
It never...occurred to me.
Just how beautiful was it?
The white Christmas that she wanted to show@me.
If I'd known that was our last chance, I@would've waited so much longer...
Oh, sorry... Bringing the mood down like that.

group_1.textLeft: Think nothing of it.
A...white Christmas.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I hope you see it this year.
Then, from above the clouds... The one you@held dear can watch it with you.

group_1.textRight: Thank you...
Please don't make the same mistake that@I made.
Wait for Tsukasa as long as it takes, okay?

group_1.textLeft: I shall!
The truth is...she's my twin sister.
Though, the two of us live in separate@households.

group_1.textRight: Twins? Wooow!
But it sounds like you don't get to see@each other much, do you?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...our father is a well-known artisan.
Tsukasa is charged with cooking, chores,@and looking after his students each day.
Even today, she's assisting our father at@a bamboo workshop demonstration.
It's a Christmas event.

group_1.textRight: A...Christmas event?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
At Namiki Street, the place well known for@its display of lights.
Tsukasa?!

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Wheeze*
So sorry to keep you waiting!
The event... It ran way too late!
And...I forgot to bring my phone...
I'm so...so sorry!

group_1.textLeft: It's quite all right. There's no need to@apologize.
I believed that you would find your way here@with all my heart.

group_1.textRight: Tsukuyo... [chara:101951:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101951:cheek_1][chara:101951:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101951:lipSynch_1]Thanks!

group_1.textCenter: Santa finally came just for you.
